#summary Examples of usage

= Examples of usage = 

== Yahoo! Weather ==

{{{
import yweather
import pprint

pp = pprint.PrettyPrinter(indent=4)

location = 'RSXX0199'
weather_data = yweather.get_weather(location, 'metric')
pp.pprint(weather_data)
}}}
